blacksmith.name: Gorim the Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: A burly blacksmith with soot-covered hands and a warm smile. He forges weapons and armor for adventurers.
dialogue: Greetings, traveler! Looking for some sturdy gear?
I can craft the finest weapons and armor in these parts.
Remember, a well-equipped adventurer is a safe adventurer!

sword.name: Iron Sword
sword.description: A sturdy iron sword, perfect for beginners.

shield.name: Wooden Shield
shield.description: A basic wooden shield that offers decent protection.

armor.name: Leather Armor
armor.description: Lightweight leather armor that provides moderate defense.
